abstract: International House Hunting column; 350-year-old stone house on Bay of Kotor in tiny town of Perast, Montenegro, is listed for $2,800,000; information about market and tips for buying properties in Montenegro highlighted.
snippet: Montenegro’s housing market was affected by the global real estate crisis of 2008, though Russians continued to buy homes.
lead_paragraph: Montenegro’s housing market was affected by the global real estate crisis of 2008, though Russians continued to buy homes.
